What is Sands?

Sands is a Time-Management tool where every second is visualized as a grain of sand.

It's a tool I made for myself to be more concious of how the way I spend my time. Personally, I use blue for work, red for fun, and green for those necessary breaks like eating or walks.

It's pretty open ended. You can use it for studying, cooking, or just to feel that nice existential dread as the sands fall down.

Personally, I use the Sands as way to analyze my time use. After all, every one of those seconds is precious...
